FAQ.a1: Yes, anyone who is a 'Builder' - developers, designers, PMs, founders - is welcome. We communicate equally regardless of seniority.

FAQ.a3: Not at all. Feel free to just lurk, or come occasionally just to space out by the fire. Use it at your own pace.
